titleStmt.title: Rome for good news, or, Good news from Rome in a dialogue between seminary priest, and a supposed Protestant, at large. An exhortation to bishops. Whereunto is also annexed a discourse between a poor man, and his wife.
titleStmt.author: Wallis, Ralph, d. 1669.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication conjectured by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
